revised_title: Kojic Acid: A Biochemical Study on Micro-organisms
tldr: This study investigates the presence and role of kojic acid, a 5-hydroxy-2-hydroxymethyl-\#x3B3;-pyrone compound, in various micro-organisms. The authors found that kojic acid is produced by several fungi and has various biological functions, including acting as a growth inhibitor for other micro-organisms.
